name: CommonNativeFacade
doc: Common operations used by all native platforms.

createMailEditor.doc: Opens mail editor to write a new email. If `mailToUrlString` is specified it takes priority.

openMailBox.doc: Opens the mailbox of an address, optionally to an email specified by requestedPath

invalidateAlarms.doc: All local alarms have been deleted, reschedule alarms for the current user.

updateTheme.doc: Called when the system theme preference has changed

promptForNewPassword.doc: prompt the user to enter a new password and a confirmation, taking an optional old password into account

promptForPassword.doc: prompt the user to enter a password

handleFileImport.doc: Pass a list of files (.vcf) to be handled by the app and if compatible, import them
